Articles.Content: Does anyone know how I can make a flying saucer, and if you can, point to a forum tutorial.
I have no idea how that would be possiable with stock parts... Good luck is all I can say

Use the KSP bug...the "infiniglide" take a round disk shape base, then attach many (like 24 pcs) of Stock small Air-plane tail wing vertically, and use the 'w' or 'e' to turn it. and woalla, it float, and never drop back to ground.
